Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
XL Comments: ML 2/11/25: We don't need to include binding agent (ISBDAGNT) records with Ipi or Rela. You can remove them as these are not in scope for PK analysis.

Label: Result or Findings in Original Units
Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to IS.ISTEST ||' (' || IS.ISTSTOPO||')'; see codelist (BINDING ANTIDRUG ANTIBODY (SCREEN), BINDING ANTIDRUG ANTIBODY (CONFIRM), BINDING ANTIDRUG ANTIBODY (TITER))

For secondary derived parameters see VLM
Notes: VLM (screen - visitnum=101, confirm - visitnum >101, titer - isorresu = titer)

Label: Parameter Code
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
IS.ISTESTCD concatenated with first character of IS.ISTSTOPO; see codelist (ADA_BABS, ADA_BABC, ADA_BABT)

For secondary derived parameters see VLM

Label: Analysis Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If IS.ISSTRESC = '<LLQ' then set to LLQ,
else set to IS.ISSTRESN

Label: Analysis Value (C)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to IS.ISSTRESC

For secondary derived parameters see VLM

Label: Baseline Record Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to Y for the last record where (AVAL or AVALC ne missing) and  . < ADIS.ADT <= ADSL.TRTSDT, within the by grouping of USUBJID PARAMCD
Note: If ADIS.ADTM is non-missing and ADSL.TRTSDTM is non-missing then take the time parts into account for baseline as well (i.e., if .<ADIS.ADTM<=ADSL.TRTSDTM)
If multiple records exist with the same date/time choose ADIS.PARAMCD =ADA_BABT first, then ADA_BABC, and lastly ADA_BABS
Notes: EG 3/5: Updated with record heirarchy when same date and time.

Label: Post-Baseline Analysis Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If . < ADSL.TRTSDT < ADIS.ADT, then set PSBLFL = Y

Note: if ADSL.TRTSDTM^=. and ADIS.ADTM^=. then consider if .<ADSL.TRTSDTM<ADIS.ADTM.

Label: Analysis Datetime
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Numeric version of IS.ISDTC  Note: only create ADTM when both date and time present.

Label: Analysis Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
ADT- ADSL.TRTSDT +1 if ADT>=TRTSDT
ADT- ADSL.TRTSDT if ADT < ADSL.TRTSDT

Label: Change from Baseline
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
AVAL - BASE
Should be missing for records where PSBLFL is missing or AVAL is missing or BASE is missing

Label: Analysis Flag 01 (Unique Obs per Visit)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Consider records where PSBLFL = "Y". Group the records by USUBJID, IS.ISTESTCD, and AVISITN. Assign "Y" based on the following heirarchy of IS.ISTSTOPO per USUBJID, ISTESTCD, and AVISITN:
1 - QUANTIFY
2 - CONFIRM
3 - SCREEN
Set to 'Y' on last record per USUBJID PARAMCD AVISITN where PSBLFL='Y' when sorting by USUBJID PARAMCD AVISITN ADTM

Label: Analysis Flag 02 (Last Post-BL Obs)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to 'Y' on last record per USUBJID PARAMCD where PSBLFL='Y' and ANL01FL = "Y" when sorting by USUBJID PARAMCD ISTESTCD ADTM. If there is more than one record per ADTM, use the heirarchy described in ANL01FL.
